====Definitions====
{{zh-adv}}

# [[all]], [[both]] (used to indicate that the statement is true for every subject or object)
#: {{zh-x|我 都 知道 了。|I know '''everything'''. [ambiguous; may also mean “Even I know”.]}}
#: {{zh-x|他 比 任何 人 都 好。|He is better than anyone else.}}
#: {{zh-x|這裡 的 人 我 都 認識。|I know every person here.}}
# {{lb|zh|emphasis on subject}} [[even]]
#: {{zh-x|我 都 不 知道，你 是 怎麼 知道 的。|How come you know it when even I don't know?}}
# {{lb|zh|emphasis on object}} [[even]], interchangeable with {{zh-l|也}}
#: {{zh-x|我 身上 一 分 錢 都 沒有。|I don't even have a single cent.}}
#: {{zh-x|我 給 她 打 了 四 個 電話，她 一個 都 沒 接。|I called her four times, but she answered none of them. }}
## {{lb|zh|emphasis}} {{n-g|Used in the {{lang|zh|[[連]]……都……}} structure; interchangeable with {{zh-l|也}}}};  [[even]]
##: {{zh-x|他 '''連''' 畜生 '''都''' 不如，'''連''' 自己 的 父母 '''都''' 不 養活。|He is no better than an animal, because he doesn't even support his own parents.}}
# [[already]]
#: {{zh-x|都 四 點 了。|It is '''already''' 4 o'clock.}}
#: {{zh-x|都 這麼 晚 了 嗎？|Is it that late '''already'''?}}
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese}} [[as well]], [[also]], [[too]]
#: {{zh-x|我 都 好 好。|I'm fine too.|C-GZ}}

=====Synonyms=====
{{zh-dial|也}}

=====Usage notes=====
* When negating {{lang|zh|都}}, the placement of {{zh-l|不}} is important.
: {{lang|zh|不都}}: not all, not everyone.
: {{lang|zh|都不}}: none, no one
